name: Beauty Salon & Dress Up Game - Fashion Girl Makeup Salon Dressup Game
name_original: Beauty Salon & Dress Up Game - Fashion Girl Makeup Salon Dressup Game
description:
Fashion girl is loaded ! Become a fashion stylist with her.
Best makeover game to entertain specially for girls.
Create your own style and make fashion match for perfect girl.
Select best clothes for sweet girl, make her up with light shades and distress her with different face packs.
Fix her eyebrow and pimples that spoils her look.
Choose fancy outfits with matching accessories like earnings, necklace, hairstyles etc to make her look glamorous.

Features:
=> Exclusive facial treatment
=> Makeup cases of different items like eyelashes, eyeliner, blushes,lipsticks etc.
=> Designer dress with fashion jewellery.
